column2:
sites <- sites %>% mutate(score=0, score=case_when(
  telemetry == 1 ~ score + 3,
  TRUE ~ score
)) %>% 
  mutate(score=case_when(
    cameras == 1 ~ score + 2,
    TRUE ~ score
  )) %>% 
  mutate(score=case_when(
    remains == 1 ~ score + 1,
    TRUE ~ score
  )) %>% 
  mutate(score=case_when(
    zone == 'cs' ~ score + 1,
    TRUE ~ score
  )) %>% 
  mutate(score=case_when(
    status.2018 > 0 & status.2019 > 0 ~ 1,
    TRUE ~ score
  )) %>% 
  mutate(score=case_when(
    access %within% c('h', 'b', 'q') ~ score - 6,
    TRUE ~ score
  ))

Error in access %within% c("h", "b", "q") : 
  could not find function "%within%"
